announcements.message: Kaleidoscope version 5.0 will be launched soon. The system is expected to be unavailable for approximately 60 seconds. Separate system update notifications will also be sent via e-mail to your system administrator contacts.

Kaleidoscope version 4.6 will be launched at 06:00GMT on the 1st of June 2016. The system is expected to be unavailable for approximately 30 minutes. Separate system update notifications will also be sent via e-mail to your system administrator contacts.
